title: Amazon's best $249 iPad 10th Generation deal is back
description: The all-time best price on Apple's iPad 10th Generation has returned, with an on-page coupon discounting the tablet to $249.99.Apple's iPad 10th Gen returns to all-time best price.Black Friday pricing has returned on Apple's iPad 10th Generation, with the silver colorway dropping to $249.99 at Amazon. author: Christine McKee
excerpt: The all-time best price on Apple's iPad 10th Generation has returned, with an on-page coupon discounting the tablet to $249.99.
text: The all-time best price on Apple's iPad 10th Generation has returned, with an on-page coupon discounting the tablet to $249.99. Amazon's best iPad dealBlack Friday pricing has returned on Apple's iPad 10th Generation, with the silver colorway dropping to $249.99 at Amazon. Buy for $249.99 The $249.99 price is the lowest we've seen on the iPad 10th Generation with 64GB capacity and Wi-Fi functionality. It's equipped with a 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, driven by an A14 Bionic chip. With front and back 12MP cameras, Touch ID, and up to 10 hours of battery life, it's a solid buy at $249.99. You may see the price on Amazon via an instant rebate stacked with a $29.01 on-page coupon or as a full $100 instant rebate, depending on your account. html:
The all-time best price on Apple's iPad 10th Generation has returned, with an on-page coupon discounting the tablet to $249.99.

Amazon's best iPad deal

Black Friday pricing has returned on Apple's iPad 10th Generation, with the silver colorway dropping to $249.99 at Amazon.

Buy for $249.99

The $249.99 price is the lowest we've seen on the iPad 10th Generation with 64GB capacity and Wi-Fi functionality.

It's equipped with a 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, driven by an A14 Bionic chip. With front and back 12MP cameras, Touch ID, and up to 10 hours of battery life, it's a solid buy at $249.99. You may see the price on Amazon via an instant rebate stacked with a $29.01 on-page coupon or as a full $100 instant rebate, depending on your account.

Latest iPad deals

  • iPad 9th Generation (64GB, Wi-Fi): $199.99 ($120 off) at Best Buy
  • iPad 10th Generation (64GB, Wi-Fi): $249.99 ($100 off) with on-page coupon
  • M2 iPad Air 11-inch (128GB, Wi-Fi): $499 ($100 off) at Best Buy
  • M4 iPad Pro 11-inch (256GB, Wi-Fi, Standard Glass): $849 ($150 off) with My Best Buy Plus
  • M4 iPad Pro 13-inch (256GB, Wi-Fi, Standard Glass): $1,099 ($200 off)

You can shop even more iPad deals and compare prices on every model in our iPad Price Guide.
